description: Make this show-stopping chocolate cake layered with chocolate frosting, fresh cream and berries the centrepiece of your festive celebrations.
name: Chocolate & Berry Layer Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 170 ̊C/150 ̊C fan-forced. Grease a 7cm deep x 20cm (base) round cake pan. Line base and side with baking paper.

Using an electric mixer, beat cake mix, eggs, milk and butter on low speed until combined. Increase speed to medium and beat for 2 minutes, scraping down side of bowl occasionally. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 50 minutes or until cake springs back when lightly touched in the centre. Cool in pan for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
To make frosting, using an electric mixer, beat frosting mix, butter and milk on low speed until combined. Increase speed to medium and beat for 2 minutes, scraping down side of bowl occasionally.

Using a handheld balloon whisk, lightly whisk cream and icing sugar until soft peaks form. (Don’t overwhisk.) Cut cake in half horizontally. Place cake base on a serving plate. Spread cake with frosting followed by 2/3 of the cream mixture. Arrange half of the berries on top. Sandwich with cake top. Gently spread with remaining cream and top with remaining berries. Serve.
